name: Clean-Up Crunch
description:
After promising his friends to house-sit, Clive decides their house is the perfect place to throw a party. Awaking from the heavy night of drinking, he comes to the horrifying discovery that his friends will be getting back today… in 5 minutes.

Test your organizational skills in this hectic storage game, trying to shove as much of the evidence from the party under beds and into cupboards within the time limit.
